docs.title: Home
docs.text:
This documentation is no longer being maintained. If you depend on a version of the Python SDK earlier than 0.7.1, you can reference unsupported versions of the documentation using the dropdown above.

For newer versions, please refer to our primary documentation site dev.hume.ai. You may want to start with our Python quickstart guide.

If you are an existing user of our Python SDK you may upgrade to version 0.7.1 using our migration guide.

Visit our Hume Python SDK GitHub repository and see the reference.md file for a full listing of methods and their parameters.

To get direct support from our team, you can join our Discord.
